name: Car Junkyard - Steel Trash
description:
Those who try to give a new life to broken and spoiled cars just waste time. All this junk is to be destroyed! And that’s your chance to acquire a junkyard with the latest equipment.


VARIOUS CARS FOR DESTRUCTION
Even the best models come into disrepair, and that’s new work for you

MODERN EQUIPMENT
Mighty steamroller, and excavator. Crush and destroy everything!

MOUNTAINS OF WASTE
Dispose vehicles and let the junkyard grows

DEMOLITION HIGHER SKILL
Master all junkyard machines and destroy more cars in a short time

Make the world cleaner and get rid of all those cars at your own junkyard!
